topic.title: Chapter Six
topic.shortdesc: The Ugly Duckling makes a discovery.

body.p: When spring finally came, the ugly duckling began to feel different. He grew taller and stronger, and his feathers gradually changed.
One sunny morning, he approached the lake and caught a glimpse of his reflection in the water. To his astonishment, he realized he had transformed into a magnificent swan!

One sunny morning, he approached the lake and caught a glimpse of his reflection in the water. To his astonishment, he realized he had transformed into a magnificent swan! After all this time, there was a reason he looked so different than his siblings. He had a different daddy!

fig.title: The Ugly Duckling Turns Into A Swan!

image.alt: Cartoon image of the ugly duckling, now a swan, looking at his reflection in the lake

body.p: His heart raced with joy as he flapped his wings and took to the water, gliding effortlessly. The ugly duckling had finally become the beautiful creature he had always longed to be.
